Source.Hana: SELECT SO."DocEntry", SO."DocNum", SO."CardCode", SO."CardName", SO."AtcEntry", Count(AT."AbsEntry") AS "NumberOfAttachments" FROM ORDR SO LEFT OUTER JOIN ATC1 AT ON AT."AbsEntry" = SO."AtcEntry" GROUP BY SO."DocEntry", SO."DocNum", SO."CardCode", SO."CardName", SO."AtcEntry"
Source.MsSql: SELECT SO."DocEntry", SO."DocNum", SO."CardCode", SO."CardName", SO."AtcEntry", Count(AT."AbsEntry") AS "NumberOfAttachments" FROM ORDR SO LEFT OUTER JOIN ATC1 AT ON AT."AbsEntry" = SO."AtcEntry" GROUP BY SO."DocEntry", SO."DocNum", SO."CardCode", SO."CardName", SO."AtcEntry"
